subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] cool edison cont....
author: Lisby
full_text:
Misty--OMG. This is amazing. What live recordings did you feed into  
EVPMaker?

I wonder if working with their own voice in EVPmaker makes it easier  
for them to construct an EVP? These are some of the clearest EVP  
through EVPmaker that I have ever heard. I am really astounded.

Ann

On May 18, 2007, at 12:58 PM, Misty Dawn wrote:

> These are from a few days ago (attached to this post for new  
> members you need to set status to "individual email" setting for  
> the group to get attachments). I decided since I downloaded some of  
> Edison's historical speech to compare to my evp voice that I  
> wondered what I would get if I threw one of those into evpmaker. I  
> got a little more than I thought I would. It even made me have to  
> google to look up the meaning of one of the technical words LOL
>
> I also included the evp vs life speech side by side comparison with  
> the evp I got from ST method. Since thats how this started and for  
> those who just joined group and have no idea what I am talkin about.
>
> Misty
>
> Ready for the edge of your seat? Check out tonight's top picks on  
> Yahoo! TV.
